snippet.title: Palallel Launch Trailer - May 27 !
snippet.description:
[DISCLAIMER] This video is the old Launch Trailer, it was update since then but we didn't want to have broken links. Here's the new one : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E4iuaOYHfiQ

Palallel, our first cooperative puzzle game will be out on May 27 !

It will feature 144 levels, 10 environments, and a lot of logic & mechanisms.

You can get Palallel for 9$99 on steam (6$99 on the first week of release) but you can also get the friend pass that allows you to play with anyone that owns the game.

Until then, please wishlist the game on steam and follow us on our socials below !

Discord : https://discord.gg/fXNgBnvRTd
Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1155300/Palallel/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/GoatApeGames
